summary:
The Brazil national football team, nicknamed the "Canary Squad," is one of the most successful in the world. They've won the FIFA World Cup five times and have the best overall performance in the tournament. Brazil has played in every World Cup and won it on four different continents. They've also won the FIFA Confederations Cup four times.

The team is known for its high-quality players and has been ranked as one of the best in history. Brazil's rivalry with Argentina, Italy, Uruguay, and the Netherlands is well-known in football.
title: Brazil national football team
